t: Bowery Expands Availability Via Amazon Fresh | Progressive Grocer
s: July 18, 2023 - Bowery greens and salad kits, now including a compostable fork, will be stocked at 18 East Coast Amazon Fresh fulfillment centers. This expansion comes at a pivotal time in the company’s growth. In July, Bowery revealed a brand evolution across its website, product packaging and advertising.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - The private label Mama Bear sells baby wipes, baby food, diaper pail refills and baby laundry detergent. In 2018, the brand began selling newborn through size six diapers, which were previously offered by the Amazon Elements private brand before their removal from the site in 2014.

t: Amazon's Whole Foods to triple shelf space for vertical farmer Bowery
s: July 25, 2023 - Bowery, a vertical farming company that grows crops indoors, is getting more shelf space at Amazon's Whole Foods, with a deal to triple the stores stocking its salad kits. Currently, Bowery's salad kits and a selection of greens are carried at 50 Whole Foods Market stores in the Northeast.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: Amazon Brand Store: Definition, Benefits, and New Features [Updated for 2021]
s: October 11, 2021 - Amazon Brand Stores allow merchants you to create free online storefronts. In just a few clicks, sellers can level up their brand image.

t: 15 Best Clothing Brands on Amazon 2023: Core10, The Drop, Daily Ritual | Glamour
s: September 15, 2023 - Want to shop the best clothing brands on Amazon? The retailer's in-house fashion brands include top-rated brands like Core10, The Drop, PrettyGarden, and more.
